website_summaries.verdict: A gentle, moisturizing mask that can also help calm irritated skin.
pros: Oatmeal helps moisturize skin while also calming red, irritated skin
Great for sensitive skin and can help improve and calm eczema
cons: Some with very sensitive, very dry skin had some reactions

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me:(
customer_reviews.text: This gave me one of the worst cystic acne breakouts I’ve ever had. I have combination/dry skin that is sensitive and acne prone. If your skin doesn’t fit into any of those categories, this may work for you. I was able to return the item easily.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Soothes irritation
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin that gets irritated very, very easily. I used this mask after applying a chemical based exfoliant (which normally leaves my skin red and a little irritated) and it left my skin calm and soft. Truly wonderful if you have spots of irritation that need some love. My only wish is that it came in a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked so well after sunburn on my skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry and sensitive skin, not prone to acne, but I have eczema and am allergic to a myriad of chemicals both synthetic and natural. I bought this after a pretty bad sunburn on my face (despite my best efforts to stay in the shade), and it really helped moisturize and heal my skin! I started to peel and was terrified it would last for weeks but after using this and a hadalabo mask (another favorite mask of mine), the peeling subsided in 2 days! Feels great on my skin, feels moisturized, and I love the oatmeal smell. No flare ups for me!
customer_reviews.author: Erika M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I use this product once a week to calm my skin and I love it so much. It has never been irritating and it smells lovely. My only complaint is that it says to do 2-3 times a week but there isn't much product In there so to make it last I don't do it that often. Overall, my favorite face mask I've ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer 619

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I get that this is a premium product, and for that, you have to pay a premium price, but it’s definitely not worth the money when the 2 oz. bottle is only filled halfway. customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set of First Aid moisturizers and had not had much success with any face mask I had ever tried. I was ready to toss a few items away immediately. On a whim, I tried this product and was amazed with the results. It is a great nighttime luxurious moisturizer- not a dreadful peel either. In about 10 minutes I washed it off and it has now become a staple in my facial routine. Can't use it every night because that's impractical...it comes in a small-mid size tube that probably would last one week. It's totally worth it when you want to pamper your inner princess.

FAST ACTING: In just 10 minutes, the mask will help restore a rough, tight complexion and achieve soft, supple results.
PROTECTIVE OATS: Colloidal Oatmeal and Avena Sativa Oat Bran with Botanical Antioxidants and skin-nourishing ingredients to help repair the look of and revive your natural beauty.

ABSOLUTELY NO: Alcohol, Artificial Colorants, Artificial Fragrance, Lanolin, Mineral Oil, Parabens, Petrolatum, Phthalates, Propylene Glycol, Sulfates, Talc, Formaldehydes, Oxybenzone, Coal Tar, Hydroquinone, Triclocarbon, Ethanol
